summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5924 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 8, University View Addition, being the alley between 31st Avenue Northeast and 33rd Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 57th Street; and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 78312, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
